message: You look just like an adventurer. Tell me child, what brings you here?

replies.text: I'm looking for my brother Andor.

message: Ok then. Good luck with that.
Ha ha, that sure sounds like an adventurer! Guts, that's what you need to be a successful adventurer, child. You don't seem to lack courage, if I may say so.
I am Reinkarr. I guess you could call me an adventurer of sorts.
No, not really. I never got the hang of the whole adventuring business. Me and some other fellows went looking for these .. crystals .. that we had heard about.
Doesn't really matter. We never found any of them anyway.

replies.text: What crystals were you looking for?

message: They were called 'Oegyth crystals'. Supposedly very powerful and worth a fortune.

replies.text: So what made you stop looking?

message: Actually, all I know is that they are some sort of crystal. As I said, they are supposedly very powerful. We were only looking for them so that we could sell them and become rich.
Just the boredom of it, I guess. We never were any good at the whole fighting thing, and as such we never found one of those things.
Anyway, it's been nice talking to you, kid. Take care.
What!? You actually have one of those things? Let me see. Yes, that sure matches the description I read.
You would do well to keep that to yourself, kid. Whatever you do, don't lose it, and don't go around showing it to everyone you might meet. You could get in serious trouble.

replies.text: What can I do with it?

message: I hear there are merchants that would do anything to get their hands on some of those crystals. You should seek out the merchants in one of the larger cities, and ask them.
